channel.title: What do you hate about what people do on these forums?
channel.description:
I hate when kids put in there signature, "omgg!1 i was warned.. y i only posted 16 topics about my gay deltascape source!!" I also hate when you're trying to help someone, they start to get upset because nothing you're suggesting is working. And, I hate when kids make smfforfree forums. Seriously? YOU CANT FUCKING DOWNLOAD AN ARCHIVE AND UPLOAD IT TO A FREE WEBHOSTING SERVICE?!
What about you? I know there was a topic, though it is completely inactive and I don't want to bump it.

I just hate the massive amount of immaturity that can be seen on these forums.

Flame wars, etc.
